name: Vishal Misra
content: Vishal Misra - Columbia University Vishal Misra RKS Family Professor of Computer Science Columbia University Vice Dean Computing and AI, Columbia Engineering Founder, Ask Here First Fellow, ACM and IEEE CV Contact Information 512 Computer Science Building 1214 Amsterdam Avenue MC 0401 New York, NY 10027-7003 Email: vishal.misra@columbia.edu Phone: (212) 853 8442 Education Ph.D., University of Massachusetts, May 2000. M.S. in Electrical Engineering, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Massachusetts, May 1996. B. Tech in Electrical Engineering, Department of Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, May 1992. Recent Professional Activities Associate Editor, Journal of the ACM Chair, ACM SIGMETRICS, special interest group on performance evaluation. Blogging Academic Blog: Peer Unreviewed Personal Blog: A little corner of a foreign field Follow @vishalmisra
